drivers.name: bj200
drivers.comments: This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

notes:
I use this printer for ascii and Postscript black only. It needs a MS-Windows driver to do colour. It will probably do 360x720 if you want to send it a prolog to switch into that mode, but I haven't tried very hard to do that, just 360x360.

Consumables/Refills: Ink cartridge
